adventure_overview: The most popular events in Cub Scouting are found in this Adventure, the Pinewood Derby® and the Raingutter Regatta™.  Lions and adult partners work together to build and race either a car or a boat. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: With your Lion adult partner, assemble and decorate either a Pinewood Derby® car or a Raingutter Regatta™ boat.

activities.name: Pinewood Derby® Car Build Day Lion
activities.description: Den or pack provides a build day for Cub Scouts.

activities.name: Raingutter Regatta™ Build Day Lion
activities.description: Den or pack provides a build day for Cub Scouts.

requirements.text: Learn the rules of the race for the vehicle chosen in Requirement 1.

activities.name: Arrow of Light Scouts Explain the Rules
activities.description: Invite Arrow of Light Scouts to come and explain the rules of the race.

requirements.text: Before the race, discuss with your Lion adult partner how you will demonstrate good sportsmanship during the race.

activities.name: Good Sportsmanship for the Race
activities.description: Cub Scouts will act out through roll playing how to be a good sport during the race.

requirements.text: With your Lion adult partner, participate in a Pinewood Derby® or a Raingutter Regatta™.

activities.name: Pinewood Derby® Race
activities.description: Conduct a Pinewood Derby® car race.
